summary: The diff shows creation of frontend/tsconfig.node.json and modifications to frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json. The file summaries indicate that frontend/package.json and frontend/vite.config.js now exist with required dependencies and configurations. However, frontend/package-lock.json (REQ-9) is not mentioned in the diff, suggesting it may be missing or not tracked. All acceptance criteria for REQ-8 and REQ-10 appear to be addressed based on the summary descriptions, but REQ-9 implementation is unclear.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create frontend/package-lock.json with resolved dependency tree matching the package.json configuration to enable proper npm install execution
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show frontend/package-lock.json as added or modified. The file-diff summary only mentions frontend/package.json and frontend/vite.config.js as existing, but makes no reference to package-lock.json.

hallucinated_features.reason: This TypeScript configuration file for Vite config was not requested in any of the three requirements (REQ-8, REQ-9, REQ-10). While it may be useful for TypeScript project structure, it was not part of the BuildRequest scope.
